casebody.data:
SONY PICTURES ENTERTAINMENT, INC., et al.
v.
HENDERSON 37P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 5, 2018 Mr. Glenn Henderson, for Henderson, Glenn Mr. David McKenzie, Attorney at Law, for Sony Pictures Entertainment Inc., et al

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th of January 2018 by Defendant for Suspension of the Rules under Rule 2:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of April 2018."
